text: ???: It's me, Lacirtcele Sus of the Elemental Offense Squad.

speaker: right
text: I heard y'all might need some help.

speaker: left
text: Everyone get prepared, we should be reaching Sine soon.

true.speaker: left
true.text: Hey.

true.speaker: right
true.text: Hello.

true.speaker: left
true.text: Can I ask you a question?

true.speaker: right
true.text: Already have, but go ahead.

true.speaker: left
true.text: What are you?

true.speaker: right
true.text: What do you mean?

true.speaker: left
true.text: I know that Scien is the head of the Knights of Static and that Lacirtcele is a member of the Elemental Offense Sqaud...

true.speaker: left
true.text: ...and I was wondering if you had a special rank, since you were requested by the king himself.

true.speaker: right
true.text: Of course I do!

true.speaker: right
true.text: I am the High Mage of the Static Castle!

true.speaker: right
true.text: And I am also the Head of Artifact Research in the Territory of Static!

true.speaker: right
true.text: I doubt anyone in the land of Bipole knows more about the Artifacts than I do!

true.speaker: left
true.text: Artifacts?

true.speaker: right
true.text: Yes, most of the general population knows not of their existence.

true.speaker: right
true.text: They are powerful relics created by the Gods to guide us mortals.

true.speaker: right
true.text: Though we do not know where any of them are now, they are hiding somewhere, waiting for someone to discover them!

true.speaker: right
true.text: Surely you've heard of the legends about the Holy Itucher?

true.speaker: left
true.text: Yeah, I've heard of it.

true.speaker: right
true.text: According to my research, the Holy Itucher exists, and it is located somewhere on this continent!

true.speaker: left
true.text: What would you do if you ever found it?

true.speaker: right
true.text: Of course, I would analyze it to it's fullest extent.

true.speaker: right
true.text: Although, I believe it is inevitable that I would fall into the temptation of trying out its powers.
